column4: when trying to upgrade my current ubuntu installation (7.04, ubuntu studio) to 7.10, I get the following message: Failed to fetch http://debian.tagancha.org/debian/dists/dapper/Release Unable to find expected entry  restricted/binary-i386/Packages in Meta-index file (malformed Release file?)
